sentence.Network_en: America is the most intellectually, artistically and politically effervescent of nations.

entry.tran: 有艺术天赋的;有艺术鉴赏力的
entry.def: Someone who is artistic is good at drawing or painting, or arranging things in a beautiful way.

example.ex: They encourage boys to be sensitive and artistic...
example.tran: 他们鼓励培养男孩子的敏感和艺术气质。

example.ex: Mary's got it all so nice — you remember how artistic she always was with colors.
example.tran: 玛丽把一切弄得都很漂亮——你还记得她以前总是对色彩很有艺术品位吧。

entry.def: Artistic means relating to art or artists.
An artistic design or arrangement is beautiful.
